text: taṅkaḷ vīṭukaḷai viṭṭum, taṅkaḷ poruḷkaḷai viṭṭum (aniyāyamāka) veḷippaṭuttappaṭṭu (makkāviliruntu) hijrat ceytu vanta ēḻaikaḷukkum atil paṅkuṇṭu. Avarkaḷ allāhvuṭaiya aruḷaiyum, avaṉuṭaiya tirupporuttattaiyum aṭaiyak karuti (taṅkaḷ uyiraiyum poruḷaiyum tiyākam ceytu) allāhvukkum avaṉuṭaiya tūtarukkum utavi ceytu koṇṭirukkiṉṟaṉar. Ivarkaḷtāṉ uṇmaiyāṉa nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷ āvar
